main event: Mrs. Robert Taylor reported seeing a bright object resembling a flying saucer three times in January and February 1956 over Harrisonville, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was seen moving slowly and was brighter than any star., The first sighting occurred three weeks prior to 13 February 1956., The object circled Harrisonville on the 14th of February., The object disappeared to the north after first appearing in the east., The reporting officer concluded it was probably an aircraft.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a flying saucer
witness description: Mrs. Robert Taylor, caller from Harrisonville
